article: A long time ago,there was a tiger in the forest. He was the _ of the animals. One day the tiger asked a little cat to see _ his palace was built. After a few hours,the little cat came back and said to the tiger,"My dear king,your _ is very large,tall and beautiful." The tiger was very _ to hear that.Several _ later,the tiger said to a pig,"It's been days since the cat saw my palace. Now,you go and see it once again ." But when the pig came back,he said to the tiger,"My dear king,I thought that your palace is beautiful,but it _ yourself only." The tiger was very _ when he heard what the pig said. "Why are the cat's and the pig's _ not the same?" he said to _ .He then asked a camel to go to have a(n) _ .Before long the camel ran back out of breath and said to the tiger,"Oh,your palace is too _ for you to live in,my king." The king became very angry when he heard what the camel said. He said to the animals,"Maybe somebody of you tells _ .You three have three ideas. I want to _ you." Just at the moment,a fox came out to _ the tiger. He asked the tiger himself to go to see it before killing them. The tiger _ .After he saw the palace himself,he thought that their answers were all _ .He said to the _ ,"You should remember that to see with your own eyes is more important than only to _ others."
